mapper.select:
SELECT E.IMG_FILE_URL AS IMG_FILE_URL, E.EMP_NM AS EMP_NM FROM EMPLOYEE E, VACATION_APPLY VA, TEAM T WHERE E.TEAM_CD = T.TEAM_CD AND E.EMP_ID = VA.EMP_ID AND T.TEAM_CD = #{teamCd}
AND VA.VCT_BGNG_DT <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND VA.VCT_END_DT >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT P.PRO_NO AS PRO_NO, P.CO_CD AS CO_CD , P.EMP_ID AS EMP_ID, P.PRO_STTS_CD AS PRO_STTS_CD, P.PRO_NM AS PRO_NM, P.PRO_CN AS PRO_CN, P.PRO_BGNG_DT AS PRO_BGNG_DT, P.PRO_MDFCN_DT AS PRO_MDFCN_DT, P.PRO_END_DT AS PRO_END_DT, P.PRO_PREGRT AS PRO_PREGRT, P.PRO_DEL_YN AS PRO_DEL_YN, P.PRO_START_DT AS PRO_START_DT FROM PROJECT P, TEAM T, EMPLOYEE E WHERE P.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID AND E.TEAM_CD = T.TEAM_CD AND T.TEAM_CD = #{teamCd}

SELECT E.EMP_ID AS EMP_ID, E.CO_CD AS CO_CD, E.DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD, E.EMP_EML_ADDR AS EMP_EML_ADDR, E.EMP_NM AS EMP_NM, E.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO, E.EMP_ZIP AS EMP_ZIP, E.EMP_ADDR AS EMP_ADDR, E.EMP_DADDR AS EMP_DADDR, E.EMP_TELNO AS EMP_TELNO, E.EMP_BRDT AS EMP_BRDT, EMP_GNDR AS EMP_GNDR, E.EMP_NTN AS EMP_NTN, E.EMP_JNCMP_YMD AS EMP_JNCMP_YMD, E.EMP_RSGNTN_YMD AS EMP_RSGNTN, E.EMP_CRT_YMD AS EMP_CRT_YMD, E.EMP_MDFCN_YMD AS EMP_MDFCN_YMD, E.ENABLED, E.EMP_DLN_YN, E.IMG_FILE_URL, E.EMP_DEL_YN, E.TEAM_CD, C.CO_NM, C.CO_REG_DT, C.CO_CNT, C.CO_BRNO, C.CO_ZIP, C.CO_ADDR, C.CO_DADDR, C.CO_TEL, C.CEO_NM, D.DEPT_NM AS DETP_NM, D.DEPT_CRT_DT AS DEPT_CRT_DT, DEPT_ACTVTN_YN, D.DEPT_IMG_FILE_URL, T.TEAM_NM AS TEAM_NM, T.TEAM_CRT_DT, T.TEAM_ACTVTN_YN, E.JBGD_CD AS JBGD_CD, J.JBGD_NM AS JBGD_NM FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN COMPANY C ON E.CO_CD = C.CO_CD LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN TEAM T ON E.TEAM_CD = T.TEAM_CD LEFT JOIN JOBGRADE J ON E.JBGD_CD = J.JBGD_CD WHERE E.TEAM_CD = #{teamCd}

SELECT T.TEAM_CD, T.TEAM_NM, T.DEPT_CD, D.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM, T.TEAM_CRT_DT, T.TEAM_ACTVTN_YN, COUNT(E.TEAM_CD) AS EMP_CNT FROM TEAM T, EMPLOYEE E, DEPARTMENT D WHERE T.TEAM_CD = #{teamCd} AND T.TEAM_CD = E.TEAM_CD AND D.DEPT_CD = T.DEPT_CD GROUP BY T.TEAM_CD, T.TEAM_NM, T.DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, T.TEAM_CRT_DT, T.TEAM_ACTVTN_YN
SELECT DEPT_NM FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND DEPT_NM = #{deptNm} AND DEPT_ACTVTN_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE DEPARTMENT SET DEPT_ACTVTN_YN = 'N' WHERE DEPT_CD = #{deptCd}
UPDATE TEAM SET TEAM_ACTVTN_YN = 'N' WHERE TEAM_CD = #{teamCd}

if.if: ORDER BY a.EMP_MDFCN_YMD DESC, a.EMP_DEL_YN ASC
ORDER BY a.EMP_NM ASC, a.EMP_DEL_YN ASC
ORDER BY a.EMP_NO ASC, a.EMP_DEL_YN ASC
ORDER BY a.EJBGD_CD ASC, a.EMP_DEL_YN ASC

sql.if: ORDER BY a.EMP_MDFCN_YMD ASC, a.EMP_DEL_YN ASC

and ( e.emp_nm like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or e.emp_telno like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or e.emp_no like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or d.dept_nm like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or j.jbgd_nm like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or t.team_nm like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' )

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT (*) total_count FROM ( SELECT E.EMP_ID AS EMP_ID, E.CO_CD, D.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_CD, E.JBGD_CD AS EJBGD_CD, J.JBGD_NM AS JBGD_CD, T.TEAM_NM AS TEAM_CD, E.EMP_PW, E.EMP_EML_ADDR, E.EMP_NM AS EMP_NM, E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_ZIP, E.EMP_ADDR, E.EMP_DADDR, E.EMP_TELNO, E.EMP_BRDT, E.EMP_GNDR, E.EMP_NTN, E.EMP_JNCMP_YMD, E.EMP_RSGNTN_YMD, E.EMP_CRT_YMD, E.EMP_MDFCN_YMD, E.EMP_DEL_YN, E.EMP_APRV_YN, E.ENABLED, E.EMP_DLN_YN, E.IMG_FILE_URL FROM EMPLOYEE E, DEPARTMENT D, JOBGRADE J, TEAM T WHERE E.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND E.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND E.JBGD_CD = J.JBGD_CD AND E.TEAM_CD = T.TEAM_CD
)
SELECT DEPT_CD, MENU_NO FROM DEPARTMENT_MENU WHERE DEPT_CD = #{deptCd}
SELECT DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT DEPT_CD FROM DEPARTMENT ORDER BY DEPT_CRT_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NM, EMP_NO, EMP_EML_ADDR FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE TEAM_CD = #{teamCd} AND EMP_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY EMP_ID ASC, EMP_NM ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMP_RSGNTN_YMD = SYSDATE, EMP_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
mapper.select: SELECT TEAM_CD, TEAM_NM FROM TEAM

SELECT E.EMP_ID AS EMP_ID, E.CO_CD, E.DEPT_CD AS EDEPT_CD, D.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_CD, E.JBGD_CD AS EJBGD_CD, J.JBGD_NM AS JBGD_CD, E.TEAM_CD AS ETEAM_CD, T.TEAM_NM AS TEAM_CD, E.EMP_PW, E.EMP_EML_ADDR, E.EMP_NM AS EMP_NM, E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_ZIP, E.EMP_ADDR, E.EMP_DADDR, E.EMP_TELNO, E.EMP_BRDT, E.EMP_GNDR, E.EMP_NTN, E.EMP_JNCMP_YMD, E.EMP_RSGNTN_YMD, E.EMP_CRT_YMD, E.EMP_MDFCN_YMD, E.EMP_DEL_YN, E.EMP_APRV_YN, E.ENABLED, E.EMP_DLN_YN, E.IMG_FILE_URL FROM EMPLOYEE E, DEPARTMENT D, JOBGRADE J, TEAM T WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND E.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND E.JBGD_CD = J.JBGD_CD AND E.TEAM_CD = T.TEAM_CD

SELECT E.EMP_NM AS EMP_NM, E.EMP_NO, E.JBGD_CD AS EJBGD_CD, D.DEPT_NM AS DEPTCD, J.JBGD_NM AS JBGDCD, E.EMP_JNCMP_YMD, E.EMP_TELNO, E.IMG_FILE_URL, E.EMP_ID AS EMP_ID, E.EMP_EML_ADDR FROM EMPLOYEE E, DEPARTMENT D, JOBGRADE J WHERE E.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND E.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND E.JBGD_CD = J.JBGD_CD AND E.EMP_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT E.EMP_NM AS EMP_NM, E.EMP_NO, E.JBGD_CD AS EJBGD_CD, D.DEPT_NM AS DEPTCD, J.JBGD_NM AS JBGDCD, E.EMP_JNCMP_YMD, E.EMP_TELNO, E.IMG_FILE_URL, E.EMP_ID AS EMP_ID, E.EMP_EML_ADDR FROM EMPLOYEE E, DEPARTMENT D, JOBGRADE J WHERE E.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND E.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND E.JBGD_CD = J.JBGD_CD AND E.EMP_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY EJBGD_CD DESC, EMP_NM ASC
SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND DEPT_ACTVTN_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY DEPT_NM ASC
SELECT D.DEPT_CD, D.DEPT_NM, T.TEAM_CD, T.TEAM_NM FROM DEPARTMENT D, TEAM T WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND D.DEPT_CD = T.DEPT_CD AND D.DEPT_ACTVTN_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY D.DEPT_NM ASC, T.TEAM_NM ASC
SELECT MENU_NM, MENU_NO, MENU_ICON FROM MENU ORDER BY MENU_NM ASC

SELECT D.DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, DEPT_CRT_DT, DEPT_ACTVTN_YN, DEPT_IMG_FILE_URL, TEAM_CD, TEAM_NM, TEAM_CRT_DT, TEAM_ACTVTN_YN FROM DEPARTMENT D LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM T ON(D.DEPT_CD = T.DEPT_CD) WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND DEPT_ACTVTN_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY DEPT_NM ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET IMG_FILE_URL = #{imgFileUrl}, EMP_NM = #{empNm}, EMP_JNCMP_YMD = #{empJncmpYmd}, EMP_BRDT = #{empBrdt}, EMP_GNDR = #{empGndr}, EMP_NO = #{empNo}, DEPT_CD = #{deptCd}, TEAM_CD = #{teamCd}, JBGD_CD = #{jbgdCd}, EMP_NTN = #{empNtn}, EMP_ZIP = #{empZip}, EMP_ADDR = #{empAddr}, EMP_DADDR = #{empDaddr}, EMP_TELNO = #{empTelno}, EMP_EML_ADDR = #{empEmlAddr} WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT CONCAT(#{deptCd}, SEQ_TEAM_CD.NEXTVAL) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TEAM( TEAM_CD, DEPT_CD, TEAM_NM, TEAM_CRT_DT, TEAM_ACTVTN_YN ) VALUES ( #{teamCd}, #{deptCd}, #{teamNm}, SYSDATE, 'Y' )

SELECT CONCAT(#{deptCd}, SEQ_TEAM_CD.NEXTVAL) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TEAM( TEAM_CD, DEPT_CD, TEAM_NM, TEAM_CRT_DT, TEAM_ACTVTN_YN ) VALUES ( #{teamCd}, #{deptCd}, #{teamNm}, SYSDATE, 'Y' )

INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE ( IMG_FILE_URL, EMP_ID, CO_CD, DEPT_CD, TEAM_CD, JBGD_CD, EMP_PW, EMP_NM, EMP_NO, EMP_TELNO, EMP_JNCMP_YMD, EMP_CRT_YMD, EMP_MDFCN_YMD, EMP_DEL_YN, EMP_APRV_YN, ENABLED ) VALUES ( #{imgFileUrl}, #{empId}, #{coCd}, #{deptCd}, #{teamCd}, #{jbgdCd}, #{empPw}, #{empNm}, #{empNo}, #{empTelno}, #{empJncmpYmd}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N', 'Y', 1 )

SELECT CONCAT(#{coCd}, SEQ_DEPT_CD.NEXTVAL) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO department ( DEPT_IMG_FILE_URL, DEPT_CD, CO_CD, DEPT_NM, DEPT_CRT_DT, DEPT_ACTVTN_YN ) VALUES ( #{deptImgFileUrl}, #{deptCd}, #{coCd}, #{deptNm}, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
